===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# A brown pill used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]] "to clear the lungs and resolve phlegm, to relieve cough and asthma in the treatment of ''stagnation of phlegm-heat'' in the lung, cough and asthma, painful distension over hypochondrium, yellow and thick sputum or upper respiratory tract infection, acute bronchitis, acute attack of chronic bronchitis and pulmonary infection.

Qingfei xiaoyan pills have the following herbal ingredients:
